oracle.jbo
Interface ViewCriteriaHints

public interface ViewCriteriaHints

Defines access to an Attribute's user interface hints.

Since:
JDeveloper 9.0.2
See Also:
AttributeDef

java.lang.String getShowInList(LocaleContext locale)

getSaveResultsLayout

java.lang.String getSaveResultsLayout(LocaleContext locale)
Retrives the Save Results Layout hint for this criteria

getDisplayOperators

java.lang.String getDisplayOperators(LocaleContext locale)
Retrives the "display operators" hint for this criteria to render the Search Region. Depending on the value of this hint the UI will render controls to change the operator used in the criteria item.

getIsConjunctionOverrideAllowed

java.lang.String getIsConjunctionOverrideAllowed(LocaleContext locale)
Retrives the "conjunction override allowed" hint for this criteria to render the Search Region. Depending on the value of this hint the UI will render controls to display "Match All" or "Match Any" options.
